original_text: And they removed from Marah, and came unto Elim: and in Elim were twelve fountains of water, and threescore and ten palm trees; and they pitched there.
korean_text: 마라를 떠나 엘림에 이르니 엘림에는 샘물 열둘과 종려 칠십 그루가 있으므로 거기에 진을 치고

sentences.original_text: and in Elim were twelve fountains of water
sentences.korean_translation: 엘림에는 열두 개의 물 샘이 있었고

sentences.original_text: and threescore and ten palm trees
